tag_list: mobile, ios, android, web, software, development, programming, joomla, magento, drupal, cakephp, php
overview:
We are a Web, Mobile and enterprise software development company based in the tri-state region of New York, New Jersey and Connecticut.

We are based in New York City and work as partners for various local design and technology firms based in the city.

Our goal is to eliminate the headaches and overheads you have - as a design firm - when working with tech firms. We speak your language and understand technology very well.

Joomla projects - We ONLY use 100% components and CCK (zoo) where it makes sense. Drupal - 100% CCK and best practice standards Magento - 100% CMS Blocks and 0% hard coding. Upgrades should not break! Wordpress - What’s not possible here? Everything is, or can be a plug-in in wordpress!

CakePhp, PHP, ASP.NET - we can kill it.

Everything we do is HTML5, jQuery and AJAX.

Mobile: IOS, Android - We work with the best partners in the industry to provide cutting edge apps, games and mobile-websites.
